imdb.plot outline: Shiva is a young boy who lives with his grandparents in a fictional city named Vedas in India. He is a child superhero with supernatural powers. He faces a lot of villains who try to harm or try to damage any people and property of his city. He beats villains, a policeman named Mr. Laddo Singh who wanted to catch the criminals but gets in trouble. Shiva and his friends are always rewarded by the Indian Government for their utmost bravery.
imdb.title: Shiva
plot: _Shiva_ (qv) is a young boy who lives with his grandparents in a fictional city named Vedas in India. He is a child superhero with supernatural powers. He faces a lot of villains who try to harm or try to damage any people and property of his city. He beats villains, a policeman named Mr. Laddo Singh who wanted to catch the criminals but gets in trouble. _Shiva_ (qv) and his friends are always rewarded by the Indian Government for their utmost bravery.::Homo Backchodian
